query.name: queryGroupList
query.content:
select g.* from im_group g where 1=1
<#if queryText?? && ''!=queryText> and ( g.name like :queryText or g.number like :queryText ) </#if> <#if number?? && ''!=number> and g.number = :number </#if>
<#if name?? && ''!=name> and g.name like :name </#if>
<#if classification?? && ''!=classification> and g.classification = :classification </#if>
<#if whereSQL?? && whereSQL != ''>${whereSQL}</#if> <#if orderBy?? && orderBy != ''>${orderBy}</#if>

query.name: updateSelective
query.content:
update im_group set
<#assign sql=""><#-- 定义一个变量"sql" -->
<#if name?? && ''!=name> <#assign sql="${sql},name=:name"> </#if>
<#if head?? && ''!=head> <#assign sql="${sql},head=:head"> </#if>
<#if avatar?? && ''!=avatar> <#assign sql="${sql},avatar=:avatar"> </#if>
<#if remark?? && ''!=remark> <#assign sql="${sql},remark=:remark"> </#if>
<#if classification?? && ''!=classification> <#assign sql="${sql},classification=:classification"> </#if>
<#if introduce?? && ''!=introduce> <#assign sql="${sql},introduce=:introduce"> </#if>
<#if location?? && ''!=location> <#assign sql="${sql},location=:location"> </#if>
<#if updatedTimestamp?? && 0!=updatedTimestamp> <#assign sql="${sql},updatedTimestamp=:updatedTimestamp"> </#if>
<#if updatedDateTime??> <#assign sql="${sql},updatedDateTime=:updatedDateTime"> </#if>
<#if sql?? && ''!=sql> ${sql?substring(1)}<#-- 截取掉最前面的"," --> </#if> where id = :id
